name: 3 Over 4
description:
(REMEMBER TO DOWNLOAD BOTH FILES, the .pck file goes inside the same folder as the .exe file. The .pck file is a kind of resource pack, and the game doesn't work without it.)

Three Over four, a game about shooting red squares and surviving.

In this game you're a blue triangle shooting red squares that spawn around you. Your goal is to survive as long as you can, and get as many points as possible. GL!

*All assets were made by made, except the font.
